Headline: Northbound #49 Western Express & #49 Western Temporary Northbound Reroute near Western/40th
ShortDescription: Northbound #49 Western Express & #49 Western buses are temp rerouted via Western, 43rd, Western Blvd, Archer & Western, due to street blockage near Western/40th

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #49 Western Express & #49 Western buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, 43rd, Western Blvd, Archer and Western then resume their normal route, due to, street blockage near Western/40th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
